content:
TEEN NIGHT – EVERY FRIDAY FROM 5-8P

Looking for a new hangout spot for Friday night or maybe you just need a break from the bitter cold? H2Oooohh!! Is the perfect place to be!

Teen Night is the new hottest event to hit H2Oooohh!! Indoor Waterpark! Happening EVERY Friday from 5-8pm!

With our Amazon Blast slides that drop an incredible four stories and the Komodo Dragon – Pennsylvania's First Indoor Flow Rider – we have all the thrills you're looking for. Plus, with the purchase of your Teen Night ticket you receive a complimentary meal voucher* for one hamburger or hotdog with soda.

That's not all Teen Night has happening, enjoy all the waterpark has to offer with unlimited rides while you dance the night away to DJ Marc Anthony spinning all the latest hits!

Experience all the thrills of Teen Night at H2OoooHH!! Indoor Waterpark! It's the Hottest place to be!

Only $20.

BOOK Now

*Limited one meal voucher per person. No refunds or cash value for meal voucher. Teen Night is open to all families and ages. In order to be eligible for Teen Night Ticket discount you must be between the ages of 13-20. All teens ages 15 to 13 must be supervised by another adult or teen age 18 and older.
